Refactoring `SendPrivateMsgReq` and `SendPrivateMsgRes` based on the OpenAPI schema. Defined nested models `FileMessageData`, `FileMessage`, and `ResponseData`. Used `int | str` for union types, `list[...]` for arrays, and `Literal` for constant values. Added descriptions and default values using `Field`. Ensured correct type annotations and removed unused imports. Kept the `SendPrivateMsgAPI` definition.
